@metadata.name: util
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, and can be identified by prefix alone.

libraryUtil 001.prefix: libraryUtil.checkType( name, argIdx, arg, expectType, nilOk )
libraryUtil 001.description:
libraryUtil.checkType( name, argIdx, arg, expectType, nilOk )
 name - string identifying the calling function
 argIdx - position of the argument
 arg - value to be type checked
 expectType - string type to be accepted
 nilOk - accept nil as type

libraryUtil 002.description:
libraryUtil.checkTypeMulti( name, argIdx, arg, expectTypes )
 name - string identifying the calling function
 argIdx - position of the argument
 arg - value to be type checked
 expectType - table of types to be accepted

libraryUtil 003.description:
libraryUtil.checkTypeForIndex( index, value, expectType )
 index - position in a table
 value - any to be type checked
 expectType - string type to be accepted

libraryUtil 004.prefix: libraryUtil.checkTypeForNamedArg( name, argName, arg, expectType, nilOk )
libraryUtil 004.description:
libraryUtil.checkTypeForNamedArg( name, argName, arg, expectType, nilOk )
 name - string identifying the calling function
 argName - position of the argument
 arg - value to be type checked
 expectType - string type to be accepted
 nilOk - accept nil as type

libraryUtil 005.description:
libraryUtil.makeCheckSelfFunction( libraryName, varName, selfObj, selfObjDesc )
 libraryName - string name
 varName - string name
 selfObj - 
 selfObjDesc -
